name: MacAddress
summary: Obtain the device's MAC address on macOS that is compatible with Mac App Store's receipt validation.
description: MacAddress is a lightweight Swift microlibrary for macOS that provides an easy way to obtain the MAC address of a device's network interface. This library is especially useful when working with Mac App Store receipt validation, as it implements the Apple's recommended fallback strategy (en0 builtin → en1 builtin → en0 non-builtin).
